serverless static site generator 

Key facts

Local development

Going serverless, generate your website locally.

Easy build

Generate your website with a simple command. 

Push to your repository. Ready !

Fast

Static websites are fast by default and

improve the user experience with minimum

page loading

Safe

No database or server is required. 

Your data are safe and reduce costs

on expensive infrastructure

SEO support

Manage SEO on any page 

to improve your visibility and get better ranking

Deploy everywhere

Netlify, Vercel, Amazon, Google, Azure, CDN.

Your own webserver? 

It's your choice.

SSR support

You need to connect your website to a Strapi CMS? NUXPRESSO supports SSR using GraphQL to reduce the fetch overload 

Responsive

Responsive from the core using TailwindCSS framework to control your website design.

Friendly URLs

Helps user experience while boosting marketing incentive

Analytics ready

Google Analytics support included.

Just add your ID and start to analyze data

Forms

Add your form submission endpoint or use the default one to collect data. 

No server required.

Media & Animations

Include images, mp4 and webm video, Youtube video, Vimeo video, audio, svg, icons and sliders to your website

Add stunning animation to any element.
